name: ZombieDefense
description:
(Made for ludum dare 50, the theme was "delay the inevitable".)

Manage a group of zombie apocalypse survivors in their hideout. Face waves of the undead each night, and by day, prepare.

Repair your shelter, improve your skills. Do you dare venture out to forage for food? You may never return!

Try to survive for as long as you can in your shelter, but I’m not going to lie to you, you really are only delaying the inevitable here.

My wife calls it “depressing”, I call it “immersive”!
